note.p: Education: City of London School (1851-1852); Royal College of Chemistry, London; Queen's College, Galway. MD, DSc

Career: Lecturer in Medical Jurisprudence, Middlesex Hospital (1870); Professor of Chemistry, Imperial College of Engineering, Tokyo, Japan (1873); Principal, Imperial College of Engineering, Tokyo, Japan; Emeritus Professor (1899); returned to England (1899); lost an eye due to an explosion in the laboratory
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1913 vol 88 pp viii-x signed by J M
